page.title: 06THE JOBS PENNARD PEOPLE HAVE
page.content: MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN THE PENNARD AREA WORK IN THE CITY OF SWANSEA, WHICH IS ABOUT SEVEN MILES AWAY. A FEW FAMILIES HAVE TWO PEOPLE WHO ARE EMPLOYED. WE MADE A SURVEY OF THE PARENTS OF JUNIOR SCHOOL CHILDREN. WE FOUND THE FOLLOWING NUMBER WERE EMPLOYED:FARMER 8,SECRETARY 13,TEACHER 13,ENGINEER 13,SHOP ASSISTANT 9,CIVIL SERVANT 3,ELECTRICIAN 2,DOCTOR 2, ARCHITECT 6,SALESMAN 6,HOUSEWIFE 75, UNEMPLOYED 9. THE AVERAGE TIME PEOPLE WORK PER WEEK IS 37 HOURS. MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE A JOB IN SWANSEA USE A CAR AS TRANSPORT TO GET TO WORK ALTHOUGH SOME PEOPLE HAVE VANS. MOST FAMILIES HAVE AT LEAST ONE CAR AND MANY HAVE TWO OR MORE.THE MOST POPULAR CAR IN THE AREA IS THE MORRIS MARINA WITH THE MOST POPULAR COLOURS BEING BLUE AND RED.MANY PEOPLE WOULD LIKE TO OWN A DIFFERENT MAKE OF CAR.
